Package org.opengrok.indexer.analysis

Class JFlexStateStacker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.JFlexStateStacker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JFlexLexer, JFlexStackingLexer, Resettable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JFlexNonXref, JFlexSymbolMatcher
    public abstract class JFlexStateStacker
extends Object
implements Resettable, JFlexStackingLexer
    Represents an abstract base class for resettable lexers that need to track a state stack.
